story_teamflare_01_02000/2401_1001_0100_: We’re not gonna let you do your bad deeds!
story_teamflare_01_02000/2401_1001_0200_: Oh? Who might this child be?
story_teamflare_01_02000/2401_1001_0400_: That’s brave of her, standing up to Team Flare!
story_teamflare_01_02000/2401_1001_0600_: Sh-shouldn’t we go and join them?
story_teamflare_01_02000/2401_1001_0800_:
If we all rush the stage, the people in the crowd
will know something is up.
story_teamflare_01_02000/2401_1001_1000_:
Diantha is trying to carry on with the play by
making that kid’s appearance part of it!
story_teamflare_01_02000/2401_1001_1400_: Yeah! We’re gonna do our best!
story_teamflare_01_02000/2401_1001_1500_: That kid can hold her own.
story_teamflare_01_02000/2401_1001_1800_: Wh-what? She took us all out at once?!
story_teamflare_01_02000/2401_1001_1900_: Even if you try to control us by force...
story_teamflare_01_02000/2401_1001_2000_: we won’t bow down to that kind of power!
story_teamflare_01_02000/2401_1001_2700_:
You’ve become an excellent head of the
Looker Bureau, Emma!
